reviews.review: Игра норм. но есть читеры и не мало

la réactivité est super! mais comme pas mal de jeux; le nouveau venu doit faire un maximum d'heures et mourir une quantité astronomique de fois pour avoir un impact; d'autre part; comme c'est un jeu public avec une organisation de championnat; les joueurs en titre sont privilégier par un gameplay alléger est performant : bande passante; image par seconde; réaction de souris. Autant regarder les pros en direct; mais pour jouer je conseille; de choisir un autre jeu beaucoup plus démocratique; et surtout avec un environnement graphique plus sympa.
will give you aids but its worth it. may ruin your life but fuck it
The game is pretty dope and now its for free but beaware there is many hackers so I suggest u buy prime

After the game gone free it is become a shit for the ranks becouse russian people use to play an speack only with them. 
Those people are griefing the game without getting any kind of ban and people keep losing ranks.
better when the game cost money.

counter strike yaklaşık 15 yıldır hayatımda zaten zevkli bir serüven. Ancak cs go ya başladığımdan beri haddinden fazla hile var. cs nin diger oyunlarında bile bu kadar hileye rastlamamıştım bu hilelere bir çözüm bulunabilirse çok daha güzel olabileceğini düşünüyorum.
good to play bad to masterize
不要因为生活放弃了梦想
This game is just like me ex. I know i shall be enduring the emotional torment and all but at the end of the day.. i get mad sex
good game but many toxic guy
This game is and all round good game great maps great devlopment in the game and just a very fun game to play :D

Hilesi bol orospu çoçuğundan ve kafası güzel rusdan geçilmeyen ama vakit geçecek oyundur main hesapta 600 saat daha var 723 totalde ve diyeceğim takma sikine hileler zaten takacak amına temalı güzel bir oyun

It has amazing graphics for a free game, it is fun to play, but it has a shit community and shit teammates: 75% of them are cheaters if you don t buy prime, but even if you buy prime, there are a lot of trash talkers, trolls, smurfs and bad players.

Игра неплоха

Bom para descontrair, existe mais no jogo, além do competitivo.
Игра хорошая не спорю, но играть можно и даже нужно с хорошим интернетом. Не очень как-то с пингом больше 120 играть против противников с пингом 5 .
Awesome game! btw get good and then start competitive, also dont play alone
